triples.name: Autonomous underwater vehicle
triples.relevance: AUVs are the primary underwater robotic platforms discussed throughout the survey for formation control research.

triples.name: Robot control
triples.relevance: Formation control for AUVs is a specialized application of robot control methods.

triples.name: Underwater acoustic communication
triples.relevance: Acoustic communication is the primary communication method for underwater vehicles and is a key dimension in the survey framework.

triples.name: Hydrographic survey
triples.relevance: Hydrographic surveys are identified as a major application domain for multi-AUV formation systems.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: Formation control methods are grounded in control theory principles and techniques.
